title: Strengthening Teaching Methodology Practice Competencies: Mathematics Teacher Professional Development for Dialogic Knowledge Building

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners will design learning activities based on the DIANA model to promote dialogic knowledge-building among students in math classes.
Learners will develop actual class scenarios using digital collaboration tools (e.g., Padlet, Google Workspace).

Teachers can write self-directed reflective journals (at least 500 characters per week) over four weeks, systematically analyze the knowledge construction process across three dimensions (content understanding, teaching method application, learner response), receive at least one feedback session from two peer teachers, and establish an improvement plan.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
